name: pneumonia diagnosis eda and prediction
full_name: h1 What is Pneumonia h2 Symptoms of Pneumonia h1 Objective of the Notebook h1 Importing the necessary libraries h1 Description of the Pneumonia Dataset h1 Reading the Data Images h1 Loading the Dataset h1 Data Visualization Preprocessing h1 Image Normalization h1 Data Augmentation h3 How do I get more data if I don t have more data h3 Data Augmentation in play h1 Training the Model h3 Creating the Neural Network Model h2 Fitting the Model h1 Checking the Results on the Test Data h1 Analysis after Model Training h1 Metrics Evaluation h1 Discussions h1 Conclusion h1 Please upvote if you liked the Notebook
description: jpeg Pneumonia is a lung infection that can range from mild to so severe that you have to go to the hospital. But infants younger than age 2 and people over age 65 are at higher risk. Along with these symptoms older adults and people with weak immune systems might be confused or have changes in mental awareness or they might have a lower than usual body temperature. Fitting the Model Checking the Results on the Test Data Observations 90 Accuracy Not bad for a start https leverageedu. com public 2021 04 Pneumonia 20in 20HF 20Patients 20Is 20Common 2C 20Lethal 2C 20and 20Preventable. You can get pneumonia in one or both lungs. If with the help of Data Science we shall be able to create a model that actually helps them to spot out the cases then we will be helping them out with faster diagnosis of the illness. com images article main_image pneumonia 3. com media 8dYmJ6Buo3lYY giphy. This had been a crucial part of the modelling activity where the data augmentation had become a crucial point. More specifically a CNN can be invariant to translation viewpoint size or illumination Or a combination of the above. Minor changes such as flips or translations or rotations. org tutorials images data_augmentationBefore actually doing that let us just take a look at a sample each of each class. Like any other model if a normalization factor is introduced the model s ability to interpret the data becomes much better. The diagnoses for the images were then graded by two expert physicians before being cleared for training the AI system. gif cid 790b76115da854fb4934d7868788dc0ae27ab27428e540f1 rid giphy. That can make it hard for you to breathe in enough oxygen to reach your bloodstream. For instance a poorly trained neural network would think that these three tennis balls shown below are distinct unique images. Need to check further into the model to understand if the neural network is already too complex and it is over fitting. com kaggle docker python For example here s several helpful packages to load linear algebra data processing CSV file I O e. Objective of the Notebook https thumbs. The augmentation too might need to be improvised in the future enahncements of this Notebook. com blog content images 2018 11 1_dJNlEc7yf93K4pjRJL55PA 1. Initially I am choosing 10 epochs for seeing the overall result. Once our model is ready we will fit the training dataset. What is Pneumonia https s3. input directory For example running this by clicking run or pressing Shift Enter will list all files under the input directory You can write up to 20GB to the current directory kaggle working that gets preserved as output when you create a version using Save Run All You can also write temporary files to kaggle temp but they won t be saved outside of the current session Reshaping images to preferred size Normalize the data set input mean to 0 over the dataset set each sample mean to 0 divide inputs by std of the dataset divide each input by its std apply ZCA whitening randomly rotate images in the range degrees 0 to 180 Randomly zoom image randomly shift images horizontally fraction of total width randomly shift images vertically fraction of total height randomly flip images randomly flip images. This exam will also help determine if you have any complications related to pneumonia such as abscesses or pleural effusions fluid surrounding the lungs. Will get on it in the future enhancements of this notebook. In order words to avoid overfitting problem we need to artificially expand our dataset. It happens when an infection causes the air sacs in your lungs your doctor will call them alveoli to fill with fluid or pus. png Example of data augmentation application in deep learning layers Data Augmentation in playA convolutional neural network that can robustly classify objects even if its placed in different orientations is said to have the property called invariance.
